feature.name: NR Combined Cell
feature.summary: The feature enables combined cells in NR Low-Band and Mid-Band deployments.

parameters.name: NRCellDU.nRSectorCarrierRef
parameters.description: Up to six NRSectorCarrier MO instances can be                                 referenced.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.arfcnDL
parameters.description: Must be the same for all sector carriers in the same combined                                 cell.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.arfcnUL
parameters.description: Must be the same for all sector carriers in the same combined                                 cell.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.bSChannelBwDL
parameters.description: Must be the same for all sector carriers in the same combined                                 cell.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.bSChannelBwUL
parameters.description: Must be the same for all sector carriers in the same combined                                 cell.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.configuredMaxTxPower
parameters.description: Must be the same for all sector carriers in the same combined                                 cell.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.noOfRxAntennas
parameters.description: Must be the same for all sector carriers in the same combined                                 cell.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.noOfTxAntennas
parameters.description: Must be the same for all sector carriers in the same combined                                 cell.

parameters.name: NRSectorCarrier.txPowerRatio
parameters.description: Must be the same for all sector carriers in the same combined                                 cell.

feature.activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012652 MO instance.
feature.deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012652 MO instance.
